attributes.action: Bring the higher tax bracket in Scotland in line with the rest of the UK.
attributes.additional_details: To ease the burden on already financially struggling people.
attributes.background: The very low ceiling of £42,000 for paying 41% tax in Scotland, is causing quite low paid people to fall in to paying 41%tax, including pensioners that want to try and earn a bit more money to save for harder times.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
